english_title: Decision of the Minister of Trade Regarding Export Reference Price for Mining Products Subject to Export Duty
key_changes: This decision sets the export reference price for mining products subject to export duty, taking into account the written proposals and the results of coordination meetings with related ministries, non-ministerial government institutions, and/or technical bodies.
action_required: Surveyors must ensure compliance with the new export reference price for mining products subject to export duty.

english_title: Decision of the Minister of Trade of the Republic of Indonesia Number 2242 in 2025 Regarding the List of Brands of Refined, Bleached, and Deodorized Palm Olein in Branded Packaging and Weighing Net ≤ 25 kg
commodity: Refined, Bleached, and Deodorized Palm Olein
key_changes: Establishment of the list of brands of refined, bleached, and deodorized palm olein in branded packaging and weighing net ≤ 25 kg, in accordance with the provisions of Article 8 paragraph (1) of Regulation of the Minister of Trade Number 35 in 2025.
action_required: Exporters must submit the brands of refined, bleached, and deodorized palm olein to be included in the list.

english_title: Decision of the Minister of Trade Regarding Export Reference Price and Reference Price for Agricultural and Forestry Products Subject to Export Duty and Service Fee of Public Service Institution
key_changes: The Minister of Trade sets the reference price for crude palm oil at US$ 926.14/MT and the reference price for cocoa beans at US$ 5,977.46/MT. The export reference price for cocoa beans, wood, pine bark, and resin is set as per the attached appendix.
action_required: Surveyors must be aware of the new reference prices and export reference prices for agricultural and forestry products subject to export duty and service fee of public service institution.
